Sims Cafe.name: gumbo
Sims Cafe.description: slow and low cooked rue mixed with the holy trinity and my herb and spice blend. saute some chicken add it all to a seafood broth with okra, andouille sausage, shrimp, crawl fish, and crab pour that over a bowl of Jasmin rice and youre ready to go.

Sims Cafe.name: jambalaya
Sims Cafe.description: we start this off with some hot olive oil sautéed holy trinity sausage and chicken breast we then add a tomato-based souse chicken broth and that Jasmin rice after cooking this to perfection all you need is a big bowl and lets go

Sims Cafe.name: bacon and shrimp sliders
Sims Cafe.description: sautéed olive oil and garlic shrimp with my herb and spice blend crisp bacon add a fresh pico de gallo to a sweet Hawaiian roll and you have a mouth full of greatness

Sims Cafe.name: shrimp stuffed salmon
Sims Cafe.description: minced salmon with that holy trinity my herb and spice blend stuffed into a jumbo prawn and grilled to golden perfection

Sims Cafe.name: blackened salmon with rice and peas
Sims Cafe.description: we have a pan seared salmon with a spice blend standing next to a Jamaican rice and peas

Sims Cafe.name: surf and turf
Sims Cafe.description: start with a grilled lobster tail then butter poached with my spice and herb blend add twice fried chicken wings to a plate of butter and garlic  sautéed noodles and you have a meal of my dreams
